mapper.sql: client_id, client_company, client_person, client_phone, client_email, client_addr
mapper.select:
select
from tb_client where client_id like concat('%', #{clientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

select
from tb_client order by client_id
mapper.insert:

client_id,
client_company,
client_person,
client_phone,
client_email,
client_addr,

client_phone = #{clientPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
client_email = #{clientEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
